reviews.review: A work of art. Funny, witty, all of the above. Portal 2 is one of my all time favorite games. Its a modern classic, if you haven't played it yet, what are you waiting for?
сюжет прошел можно играть дальше с друзьями,но у меня их нет игра крутая
Second attempt to walk through holes in the walls with different colours. 10/10 good game
Bu oyunu Nedensiz bağlanıyorsunuz ve co op çok eğlenceli almak isteyenlere... pişman olmazsınız

Awesome, creative Test-Chambers, that are a lot of fun to solve an don`t feel a single bit repeatitive. The Story is being told during the Game and without Cutscenes which makes you feel very connected to the Game. The Coop makes smart use of the already existing Game-Elements and provides with lots of fun moments. I played through both the Single and Multiplayer several Times and it`s a great time. I fully recommend this Game and Portal 1 aswell!
In this game you have to put thought and time this game is you have to stop and think and not jump into the unknown this game is not for idiots and children under 12 years
Хорошая игра, всегда было весело играть, как и в одиночке так и в коопе.
Класс игра, обязана быть у каждого
I love this game the humor, story is perfect I got it this summer sale for 1 euro. I wished the game was longer, everything else is lovely
Интересная головоломка с неплохим юмором,где-то уровень легко пролетишь а где то и головой подумать нужно.После прохождения можно развлечься в кооп уровнях с другом.Очень рекомендую.
ТОП ИГРА ВСЕХ ВРЕМЁН ТОРТИК ЛОЖЬ, А ЭТО ПРАВДА ВАНТУС ЗАСГАКАКАРАСА
Very high details. I don't think you need more from me.
Очень классная игра особенно если играть с друзьями.
Game of the Decade hands down

Советую однозначно! Потрясающий сюжет! Наверное, самая лучшая игра в истории видеоигр

To be honest not a very long game but I can see why. The length is shown for those who want to explore the world that Valve has created in the Portal series. Maybe learn more about the origins of Aperture or what of it. Another reason being people may just want to appreciate the game that much more by discovering new things or trying out the coop mode. This really shows where Valve was at their best when they were done with the Half-Life Games, up until Alyx of course.
you need to play this game that's all i need to say
解密，分工合作与极致的关卡设计

Игра Portal 2 и Portal прекрасны как 2007 игра пройдется быстро только для людей с трёхзначным iq я перепрошол эту игру где-то раз 5 в игре довольно охрененый сюже в конце Portal 2 мне было жалко Уитли игру советую всем
ты что, не видишь? тут мозги ебут
中间去吃饭了所以扔在那里了很久并不是真的需要13个小时。。。两个人休闲玩差不多三天每天两小时就可以打完了 双人关卡超有趣！
Jogo muito bem feito, fases desafiadores e história cativante.

The game is actually rly good

Game mechanics are perfect.

The singleplayer has fantastic writing and a good story.

The co-op felt flawless and fun.

And there are plenty of advancements, workshop levels and mods.

The game would run on a toaster but the graphics still look beautiful.

10/10 would recommend to everyone.

And the game costs less than 2€ during steam sales (sometimes even less than 1€ lol)

A well done game considering it is published in the 2010's era, bought this out of curiosity and i didn't regret a cent that i've spent on this game. Graphics are amazing for such an "old" game, puzzles are intriguing and challenging, story telling is wonderful to say the least. (    Portal 3 pls gaben :(    )

pretty good game
this might be petty but the loading screens kinda crush the immersion and because of that i think portal 1 is better
portal 1 also is just really tight and concise, doesnt really overstay its welcome
i wouldnt say this overstays its welcome its just kind of like you are playing 3 different games in 1 game
its still really good the gameplay itself goes hard
I really really really really really really like this game

Just like grandma used to make. 

Quality home cooking level design and imagination. Perfect flavor of voice acting, with a touch of darkness. A perfect recipe.

A legendary game, with incredible music, brilliantly designed puzzles that make you really think, excellent voice acting, great character design, legendary music, and a moving story.
Well done, Valve, for creating this game. Truly a masterpiece.
I know, I'm late to the part by almost a decade, but man its still enjoyable today.
Deja de leer reseñas y compra el juego
I killed my friends repeatedly until they quit, masterpiece 11/10.

one of the best games

no i'm not kidding
great now wheres the third valve

10/10 - Um Jogo Perfeito!

 Na minha opinião o Melhor jogo da Valve, Seguido de perto por Half-Life 2 Episode Two.

 Uma História cheia de mistérios, gameplay muito boa e Gráficos ótimos, além de cenários de tirar o fôlego e um clima meio sombrio e solitário, em certas partes do game eu me sentia meio estranho por conta do clima e das localizações, como por exemplo o começo do game e os antigos laboratórios da Aperture.
 Acho muito dahora como eles ligaram Portal com Half-Life mesmo sendo de maneira muito sutil.
 
 Vale cada centavo!
One of my all time favorite games :) definitely give it a try if you havent yet!
me encanto ya que tiene muy interesante el modo historia y su modo cooperativo ;)
Portales segunda entrega con El Muesly dando por saco y con una patata charlatana

Uno dei giochi più belli di sempre.
Da giocare anche il primo capitolo, tanto li trovate entrambi a pochi euro!

After Completing you get a Feeling like there needs to be more.

Give it a Year or 2 and i Might replay this and Portal 1.

When a 3rd Portal Comes out i will probably buy it after checking if its similar to the first 2.

Possibly one of the best sequels to possibly on of the best game. I am pretty obsessed with the story of aperture science and black mesa and this game just made my life better. Wheatly is so well written on top of the already genius storyline. The puzzle elements are even more challenging then the last game (even some of the challenge levels) but that does not make them less fun. Not to mention how its even getting supported today. For example, Co-op which also has a good story but only really at the end. The soundtrack is just beautiful and fits so well with the game and by itself. In short, speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out.
Excelente jogo. Vale cada centavo, mesmo sendo bem baratinho. Acho que é um jogo obrigatório para todos, com suas dificuldades bem balanceadas. Recomendado.

Compre este juego a regañadientes porque un amigo, que me regalo otro juego, me lo pidió, al jugarlo me encontré con una joya que no me arrepiento de haber comprado. Tiene una buena historia, una narrativa genial, típica de valve y un gameplay muy entretenido. Si bien es corto te deja satisfecho
9/10

Played through some levels. Got a headache. Got insulted a ton. 10/10
